title: The rewards for watching worlds still doesn't work for me
body:
plz help riot the rewards dont work for me even tho i have watched twitch for like 3 hours[]
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/281678055175356416/497347179682201610/unknown.png

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/281678055175356416/497347049944121345/unknown.png

replies.body:
Isn't it kind of pathetic of Riot to artificially boost the LC$ audience by bribing their playerbase with in-game rewards? I mean, whatever I guess, other companies do the same thing and worse. But at least hold your end of the deal if you're gonna bribe your players lol. 

And based on the amount of posts on the boards (NA and EU included) as well as posts on reddit, I'd say there are thousands of us that haven't gotten their promised rewards.

* Have you tried switching streams? (You can switch between the Twitch and Youtube in the bottom right corner of the stream)
* Have you tried a different browser? (Some browsers aren't fully supported and may cause issues)
* Have you tried watching for the 10 mins in fullscreen mode? (there is speculation this may help)

Failing all that, submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
